Controller Commands
===================

Set Event Mask
--------------

Control which events are generated by the HCI for the host.
Setting a bit to 1 enables the corresponding event.

.. list-table::
    :width: 100%
    :widths: 30 10 30 30
    :header-rows: 1

    * - Command
      - OCF
      - Command Parameters
      - Return Parameters
    * - SET_EVENT_MASK
      - 0x0001
      - Event_Mask
      -
